TopicTitle: Parachute staging icon should indicate safe / risky / unsafe (e.g. by color)

Articles.Content:
I've seen a mod that does this, Parachute Safety Indicator, it's a brilliant idea, fits the UI naturally, doesn't take up any screen real estate.

Badly needed, should be part of the stock game-- as it is, the only way for me to really know this is to right click and watch the context menu, which I find very off-putting (the floating menu breaks the immersion of the game, right in the exciting part where the ship is landing).
No arguments from me. I also agree using the floating menu is off putting, temperature gauges are too, but that's another request.
Agreed agreed agreed again! On the temp bars i wish there was a menu toggle to kill them forever. Tired of hitting f10 on the first time they show each session
